General.Name: Fujian Septwolves Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Septwolves Industry Co., Ltd. researches and develops, designs, manufactures, and sells clothing and apparel products in China and internationally. It offers shirts, suits, trousers, jackets, knitted sweaters, men's underwear, socks, and other knitted products under the Septwolves, Seven Wolves, and KarlLagerfeld brands. The company also provides its products through franchise stores and online. In addition, it is involved in the machine embroidery processing business; printing, property management, and house leasing operations; sales training and consulting activities; interior decoration business; and foreign trade and investment operations. Further, the company offers clothing raw and auxiliary materials; building materials; and computer software and hardware. The company was formerly known as Fujian Septwolves Garment Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Septwolves Industry Co., Ltd. in July 2001. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

3.Name: Ms. Chen  Ping
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Director
